title: Leave cancelled for ALL military personnel – MOD
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Ministry of Defence announced that due to the declaration of state of emergency, leave of security forces personnel is cancelled.
All military personnel are to report to duty with immediate effect, said the Ministry of Defence.
Reports of water cannons being imported under Indian credit line are FALSE: Indian HC
Alarmed by the violent and intimidatory tactics used to crush dissent: CPA
